body.p:
252
May 7th 4
Maj. W. H. Sidell U.S.A.
Asst Pro M. Genl.
Louisville Ky.
Major.

Your communication of the 4th inst to the Governor, inclosing copies of telegrams from Pro M Gen. and Adjt Genl. USA, in relation to the ten thousand six months troops, has been referred to me for reply. I have the honor to refer you to my letter of the 4th inst touching the information requested --

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
